Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping. The bear confiscates the disco ball and propels the Lemmings far into the distance. They land in an ice cave where they discover a console that lights up the stars in the sky and controls the northern lights. The canopy of heaven starts blinking. The Lemmings transform the ice field into an open-air discotheque!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang hits the ski slopes, although Daphnes more focused on nailing Fred with a revenge snowball. Their snowy fun is soon interrupted by the appearance of an evil Snowman Monster eager to scare all trespassers off his mountain.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang hits the ski slopes, but the fun is soon interrupted by the appearance of an evil Snowman Monster eager to scare all trespassers off his mountain.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Moxie Manatee hires The Looney Builders to build an obstacle course for the Sandy Shells Preschool Games, but Lola isnt listening to her crew.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a party boat for Mac and Tosh when Tweety accidentally makes a mistake but doesnt ask for help.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans frogspawn has grown into hundreds of little frogs. But, the mayor will come by soon. Bean has to catch the slippery green animals, but thats not that easy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean meets an aristocratic old lady when he nearly runs over her lapdog with his mini. Hes thrilled to be invited for luncheon at her grand but strangely shabby mansion. Bean is determined to rise to the occasion. Hes so busy with matters of protocol he doesnt notice that the lady and her sinister butler arent quite what they seem

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwals precious plant once a day while hes on holiday. Its all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbours gadgets while hes away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night but Mr Beans other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwals got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid wont shut as its too full of rubbish and by the time hes shut it, theyve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they wont notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - dont worry, well have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irmas brochure a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Boss takes on a particularly enormous sailor in a seedy underground arm wrestling tournament. Who knew old Boss such grit?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs And Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize an obstacle course in their cabin. Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin and they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tuffy surprises Jerry with a visit from the actor who plays his favourite TV show character The Masked Mouse. Turns out the actor is a prima donna who makes everyones life miserable.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Pretending to be butterflies, Tuffy And Jerry cause all sorts of trouble in the house, until the Duke catches Tuffy with the intention of adding him to his butterfly collection.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger is asked by her mother to watch her dog, Goliath, while she is away. Goliath is a gentle giant, unless you wake him from his nap!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Mice from Mars make a return visit and set about making mischief between Spike and Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom uses a newfangled scientific machine to make copies off himself creating a living nightmare for Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestahs insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: De gang gaat naar een festival voor de Dag van de Doden. Daar komen ze erachter dat de geest van een oude legendarische crimineel, El Bandito, is teruggekeerd om de bevolking angst aan te jagen. Fred raakt geobsedeerd met het mysterie en wil onderdeel van de legende worden.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne agrees to watch her friends kid, Wayne, and convinces Fred to take a night off from mysteries to go to the boardwalk amusement park. Unbeknownst to her, though, the park is being haunted by a fiendish clown, Madcap.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet cant touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wickets garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divyas driving skills so take the karts for a proper race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers market with Irma at her knitwear stall right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but cant afford it. When he visits a food truck thats laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game, namely lots of food supplies which are locked up. To access the keys and the food, participants must win team tests under the surveillance of a drone. The Lemmings are the yellow team. The red team is comprised of Grizzy, an oar, and a flabbergasted crab!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Problems result after Tom and Jerry use too much of a witches disappearance potion.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its Toms wedding day! Hes getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that were experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it cant possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry is left alone in an empty house after Rick, Ginger and Tom are nowhere to be seen.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry listen to the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate end chasing a superior opponent.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: We open on a SOLD sign in front of what will be Rick and Gingers house. Inside, the house is empty no Rick, no Ginger, no Tom, no furniture. Just Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors the place all to himself. That is until the front door opens and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home. Ginger screams having just seen a mouse and tells Rick to get Tom out of the moving van. Like most cats in a new place, Tom doesnt want to come out from beneath the recently placed couch, but Ginger demands he catch that mouse! And so we watch the beginning of a lifelong adversarial relationship unfold one gag at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the middle of it when Tom hears someone singing the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate, painful end chasing a much superior opponent. The song is about underestimating your opponent. Every time Tom stops chasing Jerry, the music stops. When Tom resumes, the music resumes. This back and forth continues until the chase takes Tom right past a Singing Uncle Pecos. Tom skids to a stop causing Uncle Pecos to stop singing. Tom wants to prove the lyrics of Uncle Pecos song wrong, but in the end, Toms ego proves to everyone, including himself, that he is very much the subject of Uncle Pecos cautionary tale.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After another attempt on Jerrys part to elude Tom, Jerry overhears Rick and Ginger talk about the possibility of getting rid of that "useless cat." When Ginger sounds like shes considering the possibility, Jerry cant believe his ears!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike hasnt been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. You could even say Spikes a sore loser. Thats why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. When Tom beats Tyke at a game of tic-tac-toe Tyke puts the "sore" into "sore loser" by biting Toms finger when Tom extends it for a friendly post-game handshake. Tom forces Jerry to take turns playing various games with Tyke (e.g. Checkers, basketball, hopscotch, etc). Each time they win, Tyke takes it out on them. When Tom and Jerry start throwing the games, Spikes right there to dole out his own punishment for letting Tyke win. Sometimes you just cant win!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry each build their own booby-trapped bunker.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is kept awake by the deafening sound of roadworks outside his bedroom window, but a plot to restore peace by feeding the workmen goes spectacularly wrong.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean settles in for dinner and TV, but his cozy night ends in chaos when a spring-loaded sofa launches him out of relaxationand off his seat.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet cant touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wickets garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divyas driving skills so take the karts for a proper race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batman refuses to engage Joker in a race, Prank goads Bam into a rematch. Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares and take the high road?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After struggling to solve a riddle from Riddlers helicopter Quizz, Redbird must learn to speak up and share his ideas with the Batwheels. / After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam from a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Legion of Zoom is tired of always losing. They decide to take a page from the Batwheels and try using teamwork in order to pull off a daring heist. But will they be able to work together?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird sacrifices his stealth muffler tech to sound as loud as the other Batwheels but his modifications backfire when Robin needs his stealthy skills to catch the elusive Catwoman!

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm and Manny thrill us with some spooky dance moves!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Thanks to a mysterious bag of magic beans, Bugs meets Elmer, a gentle giant who would like to build a castle in the clouds; its the perfect mission for DIYers.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Fosse Ferret hires The Looney Builders to build a stage for the kids dance recital. / Its Tazs birthday, so The Looney Builders build him a huge ice cream sundae.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the beach, the Lemmings have set up a mini funfair for tourists. Each attraction lets you to win tickets, which are then used to collect prizes from a vending machine. Grizzy, who is not very good at games of skill, steals the tickets collected by the Lemmings in order to obtain the jackpot. The Lemmings decide to create an attraction just for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that oysters can make pearls almost instantaneously: just put an object inside their shell and its automatically coated with mother-of-pearl The game of marbles that the Lemmings have invented with pearls is driving Grizzy crazy. He manages to catapult the Lemmings far away. But at the ocean bottom, they discover a giant oyster. All they need to create a giant-scale marble game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have adopted a small exotic fish thats lively and affectionate and have fun decorating its aquarium. Jealous, Grizzy finds a fish too, but his is expressionless and indifferent to the bears efforts to communicate. Grizzy plots to exchange the two fish behind the Lemmings backs. He puts the affectionate fish in an even bigger aquarium with a pharaonic decor and locks the lid. But the Lemmings have no intention of leaving their friend to Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings use all the cans and tins they can get their hands on to build a beach slide. Grizzy, annoyed at not finding his tinned fish to prepare his meal tray, recovers them from the Lemmings. In their struggle, Grizzy loses his badge! Grizzy and the Lemmings now fight over a valuable metal detector that each party needs to accomplish their goal: build a slide or find the beloved badge.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take a liking to an endangered crab on the beach and decide to shelter it from a seagull who is using its shell to open coconuts. They bring it home to a disgruntled Grizzy, who wants to watch TV in peace while snacking on Cheetos. When the Lemmings turn into full-fledged crab rescuers, the house is soon overrun with crustaceans. Grizzy decides to use the seagull to get rid of the crabs. But the Lemmings - ready to do anything to protect their new friends - embark the entire house, like a raft on water.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings boat, he could come closer to a zone thats teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owners ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In order to please Boss, the Docs plan to catch Lamput to surprise him on his birthday, but it looks like their colleagues have the same idea. A fierce race begins!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Victory! The Docs finally catch Lamput but the timing could not be worse, because Boss Mom is here to visit and she does not take kindly to her friend Lamput being imprisoned. Against his better judgement but to please his mother, Boss orders the Docs to chaperone and serve Boss Mom and Lamput as they spend time shopping, being pampered and spoiling themselves. Lamput cant believe his luck and the Docs cant believe theirs either! But when Boss Mom finds herself in mild peril, theres a chance of redemption and the possibility of a her finding a new favourite.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs And Skinny are late to work and Boss is mighty angry! The Docs cook up a quick, fake story of how they were chasing Lamput all over the city. It was a real tough chase across various terrains and thats what got them late to work!Boss calmly hears out their story and then opens his cabinet to show Lamput already caught and sitting there in a jar! The Docs sweat! We now see the Docs running all over the various terrains of the city with Boss chasing them on his scooter!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who isan Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become inventive himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost a cleverness competition, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Beans spirits.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang heads to Shaggys beloved grandmothers Florida retirement home, where they learn a crazed Ape Man has been frightening the elderly residents.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Scooby runs into an old kennel mate Axel who is a highly trained Police dog who thinks mystery of the Junk yard monster is too big a case for the gang.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When a successful video game company tries to convince Velma to work for them in San Francisco the gang becomes embroiled in the mystery of a video game villain.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy drags the gang to an arcade where hes determined to finally collect enough tickets to win the prize hes wanted since he was a boy. Unfortunately, the animatronic mascot of the place has apparently come to life and has other ideas. / Fred comes face to face with his longstanding nemesis Captain Cutler who seems to have turned over new leaf as a restaurateur but is plagued by a ghostly pirate.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy goes fishing, the Lemmings jump on the opportunity to transform the cabin into a giant ice slide. Upon his return, the bear puts an end to the rodents bobsleigh party and gets ready to savor his days catch. But the Lemmings steal his fish and draw the bear outside the cabin. Grizzy must try to recover his lunch while protecting his territory from a rodent invasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pinches a magic statue from the Lemmings that has the power to make objects appear in real life. All you have to do, is pin the photo of ones desires upon it. Too bad for the rodents snow-bike! Grizzy replaces the vehicles photo with the portrait of his beloved she-bear who stayed behind in Canada. Barely arrived in African, the she-bear disappears again, victim of the rodents trickery. It is the outbreak of a bitter dispute.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders race against the clock to build Cecil Turtle a new racetrack. Daffy gets caught up in his own desire to race and changes part of the build.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: George P. Mandrake hires The Looney Builders to build a T. Rex fossil. / Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China. Bugs worries about letting down his favorite chef.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build her a home in Looneyburg. Lola soon discovers they got the design wrong and the crew has to make adjustments.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Tweety leads the Looney Builders in building a new merry-go-round at the park for the kids. When his crane breaks down, his small size affects his ability to contribute to the build.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders learn that Taz accidentally destroyed his house, so they set out to build him a new one thats smash-proof.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestahs insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman and the mission are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast! But when the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbirds beach day plans, Bam helps him realize that even though things didnt go exactly as planned, they still had a great day!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage. As they adapt to their temporary home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of what you have.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batman refuses to engage Joker in a race, Prank goads Bam into a rematch. Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares and take the high road?

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam gushes over his personal hero and idol - Batman! During an ongoing mission, Bam awes at all the cool moves and awesome antics that Batman shows off. Potentially can be done with existing footage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit take their compost meals back to their home-tree to eat, they think they have made a great new discovery.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are playing dares and having a lot fun. All the Mushables are happy for them except Fung and Miff who keep mocking them.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: While they are enjoying the longest day of the summer, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit realise that the forest is drying out.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush wants to be just like Starmush when he grows up, because hes convinced that Starmush is the most awesome Mushable there is and that his daily life must be extraordinary. So, Mush-Mush trails Starmush, which soon annoys the Mushelder. To get rid of Mush-Mush, Starmush decides to live up to the Mushlers fantasies

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has come across a new seedpod specimen. Mushpot warns him not to take it though. But the temptation is too much and Chep cant resist taking the seedpod and opening it to find it is full of itchy powder! Argh! Mush-Mush and Lilit do their best to help their friend, but it seems like the only way Chep can get rid of the itching is to ask Mushpot for a remedy

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back, Grizzy balks at getting up. He designs clever strategies to do everything from a distance, including confiscating the Lemmings radio-controlled toy robot-transformer which he will use as a butler.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The vibrations created by Grizzys snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. But when Grizzy changes positions and his snoring stops, the Lemmings must find other sources of vibrations. Only these are no longer compatible with Grizzys nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a birthday piata in the rangers living room. The idea of bursting open a papier-mche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inside a mysterious cave Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. / Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. / Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin which was entirely redecorated for the occasion. / Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. He puts his hand inside and has fun pretending that the puppet is strangling him. The Lemmings believe that the puppet is a Super Lemming whos stronger than Grizzy and start to obey it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists hes an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy the winner being the first to climb The Big One, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadnt counted on the competitive dads dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how its done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.desc: Migration has become a dominant political issue in many countries. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun Candace hukkaa kannykkansa ja rikkoo sitten aidilta saamansa uuden kannykan, han pelkaa joutuvansa pulaan. Mutta Finias ja Ferb korjaavat puhelimen ja lisaavat siihen runsaasti uusia toimintoja. Candace on tyytyvainen kunnes puhelin telesiirtaa hanet Paasiaissaarille! Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa Noutonaattorin. / Isa katselee lapsuutensa lempisarjaa, mutta television taikamattoajelu ei veda vertoja ajan kultaamille muistoille. Siispa Finias ja Ferb paattavat tehda hanelle oikean lentavan maton. Silla valin Candace yrittaa ennustaa tulevaisuutta onnenkeksien avulla ja tohtori Tollontyo on varastanut hankalasti puhdistettavia aineita Tahranaattoriaan varten.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun Candace pilaa kampauksensa juuri ennen Jeremyn aidin jarjestamaa hyvantekevaisyysgaalaa, han joutuu turvautumaan Finiaksen ja Ferbin apuun. Han ei kuitenkaan noudata poikien ohjeita ja on pian kokonaan karvan peitossa. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo on rakentanut Tosi-Pahanaattorin ja odottaa innolla, etta paasee nakemaan, mita se tekee. / On Danvillen vuosittaisten lihamurekefestivaalien aika ja aiti paasee toimimaan mureketuomarina. Kun Buford rikkoo festivaalien pomppulinnan, Finias ja Ferb rakentavat jattilaislinnan sen tilalle. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo, joka on paattanyt voittaa murekekilpailun, kayttaa Madattajanaattoria pilatakseen muiden kilpailijoiden murekkeet.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Esihistorian hamarissa luolapojat Finias ja Ferb keksivat ensin pyoran ja sitten ensimmaisen auton. Candace yrittaa tietenkin karayttaa veljiaan ja keksii vahingossa samalla tulen. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa alkukantaisen naattorin, jonka avulla han pyrkii viemaan asuinpaikan kehittyneemmilta lajitovereiltaan. / 1500-luvun Kiinassa pahamaineinen rosvopaallikko Tollokaani kaappaa hallitsijan tyttaren, prinsessa Isabellan. Finias, Ferb, Buford ja Baljeet lahtevat etsimaan nokkaelainmestari Perrya Jyrkimman Jyrkkyyden Jyrkkavuorelta pelastaakseen prinsessan.

Perry epailee tohtori Tollontyon liittyvan asiaan ja paatyy avustamaan perivihollistaan. / Candace pyytaa, etta Stacy hypnotisoi hanet, niin etta han voi nauttia treffeista Jeremyn kanssa miettimatta veljiensa karayttamista. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on murtanut nilkkansa ja on toipilaana kun Finias ja Ferb rakentavat stratosfaarin ionisoijaa. Koska Candace haluaa silti paasta karayttamaan veljensaa, han joutuu keksimaan luovia keinoja saadakseen aidin huomion. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo valmistautuu hyokkaamaan Kanakeittonaattorillaan ja Perryn taytyy pysayttaa hanet. / Flynn-Fletcherit ovat palaamassa kotiin autoretkelta ja Finias ja Ferb paattavat rakentaa perinteisen amerikkalaisen tienvarsikahvilan retkiauton katolle. Silla valin Perryn taytyy estaa tohtori Tollontyota kuljettamasta rajahdysherkkaa nestetta kaupunkiin.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace innostuu kun pojat rakentavat jattiversion hanen lempilautapelistaan muuttamalla koko kaupungin Voropoli-pelilaudaksi. Silla valin Vanessa on telttaretkella ystaviensa kanssa ja tohtori Tollontyo pyytaa Perryn apua tyttarensa suojelemiseksi. / Kun Baljeet kertoo Finiakselle ja Ferbille sukunsa epaonnisesta polkupyorakilpailuhistoriasta, pojat rakentavat oman pyoraratansa, jotta han saisi voittaa. Silla valin Candace aikoo hankkia todisteita poikien puuhista uuden videokameransa avulla, mutta Tollontyon Ponnahdusnaattorin mainokset uhkaavat pilata hanen suunnitelmansa.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Lord Ashfordly avab haarberi turistidele. Juba esimese ekskursiooni ajal kaob neli Constablei visandit. Kuriteos kahtlustatakse uut teenijat, samuti kindlustusfirma esindajat, kuid selgub, et kaheksakumneaastane meistervaras tahtis laulda oma luigelaulu.

programme.title: Lint
programme.desc: Kiirekskursioon ETV arhiivides. Seekordses "Lindis" on vaatluse all Nukogude elu kohustuslik kajastamine ETV-s.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Juba sadakond aastat tagasi muudeti oluliselt Kasari je umbruses veereiimi, et parema heinasaagi nimel luhta kuivendada. See mjutas aga poordumatult Matsalu okosusteemi, mida puutakse nuud pisikeste sammukeste haaval parendada. Tutvume juba tehtud taastamistoodega ja uurime, milline viks olla piirkonna tulevik. Laheme koos loodusfotograafi ja filmitegija Joosep Matjusega otsima 2025. aasta looma ptra, kes peab sugisel pulmi. Tarmo Mikussaare luhiloo staariks on metssiga. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, reissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Planeedipaastjad
programme.desc: Planeedi paastmise eesmargil tmbame Mart Haberi pere toidulaua veelgi koomale - nuud tuleb neil leida sobiv soogikraam vimalikult kodu lahedalt. Liisa Pulk sukeldub aga taaskasutuse kirevasse maailma ja teeb seal paar vaga olulist avastust. Saatejuht Kadi Jaanisoo-Kuld, reissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Marit Ummelas, produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Metslased
programme.desc: Metslased on Raplamaal. Liigume Palukula Hiiemaelt Loosalu rappa. Raba servas kohtume Andresega, kes tutvustab meile erinevaid kalade katte saamise viise, proovime ka ise Loosalu jarvest kala katte saada. Kuidas liikuda ilma laudteeta rabas? Sookail ajab pea sassi ja kaotame metsas suunataju. Meistrimees Jaan vuntsib ules vanatehnikat ja teeb taaskasutuskunsti. Kohtume seninagemata elukaga ja maitseme maailma parimat ei utle, saates naete. Lisaks uusi tarkusi loodusest ja kasulikke matkanippe. Sarja autor Lemo.

programme.title: Wikmani poisid
programme.desc: Lugu koolielust ja uhe plvkonna kujunemisest aastatel 1937-1944. Stsenaristid Hugo Ader, Andres Maimik, Anu Soolep ja Vilja Palm. Reissoor-lavastaja Vilja Palm, operaatorid Aarne Kraam ja Rein Lillmaa, kunstnik Tiiu bi, helilooja Sven Grunberg, toimetaja Hanneli Reili.

programme.title: Suus sulav Eesti
programme.desc: Peipsiaar on piirkond, kus uhe kula eri otstes vidakse raakida isegi eri keelt - nii palju kultuuride, religioonide ja rahvaste segunemist ei ole Eestis kuskil mujal. Lisaks on oma jalje sellekandi toidukultuuri jatnud ka tsaari-Venemaa kroonitud peade kokad. Saatejuht Angelica Udekull, toimetaja Robert Krvits, montaaireissoor Vladlen Pobjarin, produtsent Laura Krvits.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Laine proovib Evelini mehele panna. Tiina tunnistab Margnale midagi oma mineviku kohta. Maria vihastab Henry peale. Anu ja Brita kaivad Iirise juures kohvikus.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: "Maahommik" randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende pnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just "Maahommiku" saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, reissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Varastatud lootus: Armukelm
programme.desc: Tarmo kaitumismuster ei ole muutunud. Kohtudes Signega on tema plaanid paigas ja selge on ka tsiasi, et Tarmol on mitu rauda korraga tules. Edukas ja enesekindel Eleri on langenud samuti Tarmo puunisesse ning kumbki naine ei mista, et Tarmo eesmargid on hoopis teised, kui Signe ja Eleri seda sooviksid. Osades Mart Avandi, Tiina Tauraite, Liina Vahtrik, Mirtel Pohla, Indrek Sammul, Gert Raudsep jpt. Idee autor ja reissoor Tambet Tuisk, operaator-lavastaja Ants Martin Vahur. Stsenaristid Livia Ulman, Andris Feldmanis ja Tambet Tuisk. Produtsent Jaan Laugamts.

programme.title: Tippvormi(s)
programme.desc: Kas kolme kuuga on vimalik oma kesist vormi parandada ja sooritada kaitsevae kehaliste vimete kontrolltest? Uues eksperimentaalses saatesarjas naeme, kuidas kumme inimest alustavad rasket teekonda - neil tuleb treeningsaalis valada higi ja pisaraid ning uletada oma vimete piire erinevatel valjakutsetel. Seekord pannakse osalejate vimed proovile 1. jalavaebrigaadi juures Tapal. Selgub, et uhe osaleja tervis ei vimalda saates jatkata ja mangu astub must hobune. Saatejuht ja produtsent Kaidor Kahar, treenerid Eneli Kutter ja Siim Tnisson. Reissoor Tarvo Tammeoks, toimetaja Heleri All, monteerija Alar Nilov.

programme.title: Mati Alaver - valgusest varju
programme.desc: Kaheosaline dokumentaal, mis jutustab, kuidas nukogude ajal Eesti NSV naiste murdmaakoondise juures alustanud usinast ja uuenduslikust eesti treenerist sai rahvusvahelise murdmaasuusatamise uks mjukam ning tuntum spetsialist, kes tstis sportlasi olumpiapjedestaalidele, aga havitas ka karjaare. Ta palvis tunnustust, auhindu ja kiitust, aga pettis samal ajal keeruliste kombinatsioonidega dopingukontrolle, sponsoreid ja spordispru. "Mati Alaver - valgusest varju" on traagiline lugu poorasest vaimustusest ja rangast pettumusest, mille telgitagustes peitub palju pooltoone ning fakte, mida uldsus esimest korda kuuleb. Autor-stsenarist Mihkel Karmas, reissoorid Raivo Maripuu, Vladlen Pobjarin, toimetajad Kristjan Pihl, Taavi Eilat, Maarja Varv, Merilin Parli, Uljana Kuzmina, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Merle Palmiste. Elulaval
programme.desc: Mangides ma soovin kige rohkem, et inimesed saaksid natuke naerda ja elujudu juurde. See on peamine. Tanapaeval on nii palju iendamist ja kriitikat, vajatakse rohkem leevendust. Eesti Draamateatri naitleja Merle Palmistega kohtus Margus Saar. Reissoor Rait Roland Veskemaa, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske. 1. novembril oli Merle Palmistel 50. sunnipaev. Palju nne!

programme.title: Klassikatahed
programme.desc: Muusikamaailmas juhtub sageli, et esineda tuleb partneriga, kellega kohtud alles laval, ega saa eelnevalt midagi koos harjutada. Nii on ka Klassikatahtede viiendas saates - vistlejad ei tea, kellega tuleb neil lava jagada. llatusena noortele on nende partneriteks sel korral Eesti muusika absoluutsed tipud - Tnu Kaljuste ja Filharmoonia kammerkoor, Andres Mustonen ja Hortus Musicus, Hans Christian ja Karolina Aavik, Elina Nechayeva, Indrek Laul ning Olav Ehala ja Lembit Saarsalu. Kuidas vistlejad ootamatus olukorras hakkama saavad ning kui nauditavalt lood klavad, oskavad hinnata saate kohtunikud - maailmalavadel tuntud sopran Mirjam Mesak-Gerbeth, helilooja ja pianist Rein Rannap ning ERSO peadirigent Olari Elts. Saadet juhib Johan Randvere. Konkurss Klassikatahed sunnib Eesti Televisiooni, Klassikaraadio, Eesti Kontserdi ning Kultuuripartnerlus SA koostoos.

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: Menukomoodia, mis ti Jack Nicholsonile parima meespeaosa ja Helen Huntile parima naispeaosa Oscari. Kirjanik Melvin on uks talumatuma iseloomuga inimesi maailmas. Olukord muutub veelgi hullemaks, kui ta naaber haiglasse toimetatakse ja Melvin peab tolle koera kantseldama hakkama. Samal ajal haigestub Caroli laps ja naine ei ilmu enam kohvikusse toole. Kuivrd Carol oli ainus ettekandja, kes kiuslikku kirjanikku teenindama nustus, siis ahvardab Melvinit hommikusookidest ilma jaamine

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth
programme.desc: Novembris saabuvad miljonid monarhliblikad talveks Mehhiko metsadesse, uhildades oma saabumise hingedepaeva rituaalidega. Luna-Aafrikas naasevad mask-kangurlindude meeleheaks vihmad ja Aasias austavad inimesed valgusfestivalil veejumalannat. Kuuseis ja soojenev meri kaivitavad Austraalia lahistel Suurel Vallrahul korallide kudemise. Phjapoolkera ulaosas hakkab lund sadama ja algab talv. Linnad saravad, julutuled suttivad ja Arktika taevas sahvivad virmalised.

programme.title: Pea ees vette. Tai Kuningriigis
programme.desc: Sarja seekordne osa viib Pireti, Egerti ja Milli tagasi Taimaa pulbitsevasse pealinna Bangkokki. Seal ootab ees rmus kohtumine Eesti vutiassa Henri Anieriga, kelle uus koduklubi on Tai krgliigas mangiv Muangthong United. Sel korral juavad Milderid aga ka Tai Kuningriigi kige ilusamasse punkti ehk Phi Phi saartele. Reissoor Egert Milder, toimetaja Piret Jarvis-Milder. Tootja Kaks Vulkaani.

programme.title: Toiduteadlik
programme.desc: Kas roheliseks lainud kartulit vib suua ja miks peab rohelisi ube enne soomist kuumtootlema? Peakokk Angelica Udekull raagib taimetoksiinidest.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Eesti parimad ettevtted 2025
programme.desc: Lugude jutustamine on koitnud inimesi juba aegade algusest. Sel aastal raagib Eesti parimate ettevtete auhinnagala lugusid neist, kes kirjutavad puhendunult ja sudikalt tegutsedes Eesti ettevtluse eduloo uut peatukki. Teleulekanne viib vaatajad Rahvusraamatukogu uuenenud ruumidesse. htut juhivad Piret Jarvis ja Sander Rebane, lugusid muusikas jutustavad Liisi Koikson, sam, Genka, SADU band, nublu, Anett ning mitmed teised erakordsed artistid. htu kulminatsioonina selgub tanavune aasta ettevte. Teleulekande reissoor on Eva Katariina Taimre, produtsent Helen Valkna. Auhinnagala teleulekannet saavad nautida ka vaegnagijad ja -kuuljad.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Sotsiaaltootaja Margit kulastab Annelit ja Taivot. Torim kutsub Annemai teatrisse. Mare annab Almale preemia. Oliver-Sten ja Raivo Tiik osalevad valimisdebatis.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport. Sport
programme.desc: Sport. Sport

programme.title: Varastatud lootus: Armukelm
programme.desc: Juhuse tahtel kohtuvad Signe ja Eleri ning avastavad, et nende armas Tarmo on petis. Naiste enesekindlus ja nn purunevad, kuid koos on seda koormat siiski kergem taluda. Kuid kas taluda ka luuasaamist vi on sellest olukorrast siiski valjapaas? Kattemaksuplaani Tarmole asub orkestreerima kummalist rolli mangiv Mariliis. Osades Mart Avandi, Tiina Tauraite, Liina Vahtrik, Mirtel Pohla, Indrek Sammul, Gert Raudsep jpt. Idee autor ja reissoor Tambet Tuisk, operaator-lavastaja Ants Martin Vahur. Stsenaristid Livia Ulman, Andris Feldmanis ja Tambet Tuisk. Produtsent Jaan Laugamts.

programme.title: Suur vidusit. Lancia Audi vastu
programme.desc: Film 1983. aasta autoralli maailmameistrivistlustest, mis tegi revolutsiooni autospordis. Suureparane naitlejaansambel aitab vaatajatel tunda sedasama adrenaliinitulva, mida tundsid toona ralli pealtvaatajad. 51. Monte Carlo ralli osutus maailma kige vistluslikumaks ja ohtlikumaks spordisundmuseks. See oli kahe auahne firma, kahe filosoofia, kahe legendaarse titaani Audi ja Lancia juproov, roolis maailma parimad rallisitjad.

programme.title: Perekonnavaled
programme.desc: Filmi tegevus toimub linnas, kus on professionaalne sumfooniaorkester, mille eesotsas seisab autoritaarne ja kindla kaega dirigent Paul Levald, kes on juba aastaid ohjanud nii orkestrit kui ka suhteid peres

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Annie too on kaalul. Lee koondab vimu enda katte ning Stevie ja Gracie pannakse valjakutsele minnes jalle kokku, ent sellel on hirmsad tagajarjed.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth
programme.desc: Novembris saabuvad miljonid monarhliblikad talveks Mehhiko metsadesse, uhildades oma saabumise hingedepaeva rituaalidega. Luna-Aafrikas naasevad mask-kangurlindude meeleheaks vihmad ja Aasias austavad inimesed valgusfestivalil veejumalannat. Kuuseis ja soojenev meri kaivitavad Austraalia lahistel Suurel Vallrahul korallide kudemise. Phjapoolkera ulaosas hakkab lund sadama ja algab talv. Linnad saravad, julutuled suttivad ja Arktika taevas sahvivad virmalised.

programme.title: Osooni lood
programme.desc: Martin Vesbergil nnestus jalgida sugisel pulmi pidavaid punahirvi, kellest julgemad end kaamera kohalolust uldse segada ei lasknud.

programme.title: Namaste
programme.desc: Sarja viimane osa viib reisisbrad Lucknow linnast puhasse ja salaparasesse Varanasi. Seal, hindude puhaimas linnas, Gangese kallastel kohtuvad sungus ja helgus ning kultuuride eriparad. Reisiseltskonnale pakub uus linn nii kaunist kui ka kummastavat. Salaparast ja pnevat Indiat meenutavad Ott Nool, Christopher Rajaveer ja Karl Robert Saaremae.

programme.title: Wikmani poisid
programme.desc: Kaes on 1937. aasta. Kohtume peategelastega saksa keele tunnis ja koolipeol. Stsenaristid Hugo Ader, Andres Maimik, Anu Soolep ja Vilja Palm. Reissoor-lavastaja Vilja Palm, operaatorid Aarne Kraam ja Rein Lillmaa, kunstnik Tiiu bi, helilooja Sven Grunberg, toimetaja Hanneli Reili.

programme.title: Prillitoos
programme.desc: Illuka Villi ehk Villio Reinsalu on oma kodukandi hing. Eluplisel direktoril on siiski veel uks unistus pidada oma 100. sunnipaeva sites rongiga Eestist Berliini. Kuidas jagada oma malestusi noorema plvkonnaga ja panna nad perekonnaalbumite vastu huvi tundma? Reet Linna kohtub Reigo Kimmeliga, kes petab fotosid varviliseks muutma ja naitab, kuidas pildil olev vaarvanem rmsamaks muuta. Jagame nuandeid tervisest ja Aivi Parijgi viib teid kokku uhe erakordse inimesega.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Reissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Luhhike oppetus Eesti kultuurist
programme.desc: Kuidas oleme judnud esimesest ooperist Arvo Pardi ja espresso macchiatoni? Vi Michel Sittowist kaeraudades naksitrallini? Sellele annab vastuse Priit ja Mart Piusi uus saatesari, mille esimeses osas pivad vennad tegema nii kammkeraamikat kui ka sooma jurssi. Labi astuvad Mari Kalkun, Anna Hints, Kirke Kangro, Aivar Kriiska, Aimar Ventsel ja paljud teised. Sarja stsenarist on Tauno Vahter, reissoor Raivo Maripuu, toimetaja Kai Vaartnu ja kunstnik Karel Korp.

programme.title: Vetelkndija
programme.desc: Armastatud poetessi, Kristiina Ehini ausad, ilusad ja valusad jagamised avavad meile, millistest kogemustest on ta pidanud labi tulema, et kasvada selleks naiseks ning poeediks, kellena me teda tana tunneme. kskik kui muinasjutuline filmi peategelase elu ja isiksus krvaltvaatajale paistab, teavad vahesed, kuidas ta ise selle muinasjutu enda elus reaalsuseks on loonud.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Eve Mare Maide armastab teatrit ja on Draamateatriga kokku kasvanud paris pisikesest peale, sest siin tootas ka ta isa. Eve Mare on see inimene, kellele te sisenedes oma piletid ulatate ja kes vastutab, et publiku poolel kik korras oleks. Saatejuht Reet Linna, reissoor Kertu Koosel, toimetaja Marika Kaasik, produtsent Ene-Maris Tali.

programme.title: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: Harvey antud uus tunnistus ahvardab kogu loo segi paisata. Samas ilmub valja veel uks tundmatu, kes on Harveyt imetlenud ja temaga kontaktis olnud.

programme.title: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: Kogu politsei otsib Helenit taga ja puuab kahtlusaluselt tema asukohta teada saada. Rick ja Ffion ei aima aga viimse hetkeni, et teline mrvar on nad algusest peale ara petnud.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Viimases osas viib tudengi mrva uurimine Vera tagasi lapseplve radadele ja peale juhtumi peab ta silmitsi seisma oma malestustega ning otsustama, kas ta vtab vastu ametikrgenduse vi valib endale hoopis rahulikuma tuleviku.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: "Maahommik" randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende pnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just "Maahommiku" saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, reissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: TeadusEST
programme.desc: Teadlaste too ei piirdu vaid kabinetis arvuti taga teadustood kirjutades vi laboris katseid tehes. See vib hlmata ka teaduse populariseerimist labi teadusajakirjanduse, lauamangude vi haridusprojektide. TeadusEST tutvustab teadlasi, kes oma too krvalt on vtnud sudameasjaks naidata ka teistele, kui lahe on olla teadlane. Saatejuht-toimetaja Kristjan Pihl, toimetaja Liisi Molder, reissoor Liis Lindmaa, produtsent Anatoli Tafituk, tootja Ulm Production. Saade valmib koostoos Eesti Teadusagentuuriga.

programme.title: Toiduteadlik
programme.desc: Mis vahe on "parim ennel" ja "klblik kunil" ning kas kuupaeva kukkudes viks toit kukkuda prugikasti? Peakokk Peeter Pihel teeb asja selgeks.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ukraina stuudio
programme.desc: Venelaste surve rinnetel on kasvanud ja Ukraina kaitsjate jaoks hakkab olukord kriitiliseks muutuma nii Pokrovskis kui ka Kupjanskis. Mis on selle phjused ja kui kaua suudavad ukrainlased neid linnu veel hoida, seda selgitab peastaabi ulema asetaitja merevevaekapten Peeter Ivask. Venemaa on samas silmitsi kasvava inflatsiooni, vahenevate eksporditulude, suveneva toojupuuduse ja krgete intressimaaradega. USA ja Euroopa Liidu uued sanktsioonid mjuvad ja riigi keskpank hoiatab riskide kuhjumise eest. Venemaa majanduse olukorda selgitab Swedpanki peaokonomist Tnu Mertsina. Saatejuht on Reimo Sildvee. Toimetaja Peep Kala, reissoor Rait Roland Veskemaa, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Klassikatahed
programme.desc: Klassikatahed

programme.title: Killud
programme.desc: Kas Duo Ruut on pigem paar hulisi haldjaneide vi uudishimulik kahepaine lohe? Kuidas ja miks kaks noort naist uhest rahvapillist sedavrd mustilisi helisid valja kangutavad, et terve maailm ahhetab?

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport. Sport
programme.desc: Sport. Sport

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Mount Edenis vallandub teline kaos. Grace puuab Henryt Lee kontrolli alt vabastada. Happy kuuleb viimaks tde.

programme.title: Hercule Poirot
programme.desc: Maailmarahu toetuseks korraldatakse rahvusvaheline vastuvtt, mille tipuks on malemat eaka vene suurmeistriga. Paraku sureb malesuurmeister otse malelaua taga ja ajakirjanduses ilmuvad lood salaparasest Suurest Nelikust. Poirotgi hakkab uurima poliitilisi telgitaguseid, kuid taipab peagi, et mrvar tegutseb marksa isiklikumatel motiividel.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Reissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Restoran 0
programme.desc: Ott, Mart ja Hannes kohtuvad Viljandis, et ellu viia poorasena tunduv plaan - ehitada seitsme paevaga restoran! Ees seisab ohtralt lahendamist vajavaid kusimusi - kus, kuidas ja milliste vahenditega? Saatejuhid Ott Tomik, Mart Metsallik ja Hannes Praks. Reissoor Mikk Jurjens, produtsent Eero Reinu.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: The 10 remaining chefs visit an authentic Italian bakery. Then, the judges challenge them to create a menu incorporating bread into every dish.

programme.title: Cake Boss

programme.title: Cake Boss

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri stops in Portland, OR, and Charlotte, NC, to sample grilled cheese sandwiches with a twist, schnitzel, sausage and Swiss specialities.

programme.title: Chopped

programme.title: Chopped

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Rachel shows how the best food can come in small packages. She serves up wraps stuffed with roasted vegetables, puff pastry parcels and pan-fried dumplings.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures

programme.title: Top Gear Suomi
programme.desc: Mika auto sopii parhaiten satunnaiselle keikkakuskille? Epailyttavissa tehtavissa selviaa, onko se Mitsubishi Pajero, Ford Transit vai Mercedes Benz S-Class. Vieraana Sami Hedberg.

programme.title: Lomakoti auringon alta
programme.desc: Kausi 1. Jakso 18/20. Napolin Riviera. Juontajat ovat taas Italiassa. Talla kertaa he tutkailevat kohteita Napolin Rivieralla eli Amalfin rannikolla. Luvassa on mielettomia nakoaloja, mutta myos erittain paljon portaita. Englantilainen lifestyleohjelma.

programme.title: Lomakoti auringon alta
programme.desc: Nyt tutustutaan Fuerteventuran perinteisiin kohteisiin. Eras talo vaikuttaa silta kuin Harry Potter olisi kaynyt siella. Enta mika inhottaa Amandaa? Luvassa on myos jylhia maisemia.

programme.title: Burgerimiehet Aasiassa
programme.desc: Burgerimiehet Akseli ja Ossi vetavat keittoa Vietnamissa niin innokkaasti etta joutuvat Saigonille. Riisinhallinta onnistuu ja perinteinen vietnamilainen munakahvi piristaa!

programme.title: Farmi Suomi
programme.desc: Taistelu semifinaali- ja finaalipaikoista kuumenee ja samaan aikaan Farmilla aletaan valmistautua tulevaan talveen. Torpparinvalinnassa selviaa, lunastetaanko jo kertaalleen petetyt lupaukset. Areenalla nahdaan kaikkien aikojen yllatys ja kamppailu finaalikolmikkoon paasysta on totisempi kuin koskaan.

programme.title: Suuri seikkailu
programme.desc: Kauden aloituksessa kuusitoista seikkailijaa matkaavat Lappiin haastamaan itsensa ja toisensa Lapin luonnossa, erilaisissa henkista ja fyysista voimaa mittaavissa strategiakilpailuissa. Ensimmaisena haasteenaan heilla on Yllaksen huiputus.

programme.title: Alaskan jaalentokentta
programme.desc: Kausi 3. Jakso 7/8. Jumissa lumessa. Kentan huoltajilla on kadet taynna toita, kun jaatava sade uhkaa tehda kiitoteista luisteluratoja, minka lisaksi harmaita hiuksia aiheuttaa saapuvien ja lahtevien lentojen ruuhka. Seikkailunhaluinen pariskunta haluaa menna naimisiin eramaassa, joten he ovat vuokranneet helikopterin viemaan heidat vuorille vaihtamaan vihkivaloja. Amerikkalainen realitysarja.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Eddien entisen kumppanin, sosiaalityontekijaksi muuttuneen Rachel Wittenin paluu koettelee Frankin lojaalisuutta, kun Rachel nostaa syytteen liiallisesta voimankaytosta poliisia vastaan.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny tekee jalleen yhteistyota Texas Ranger Waylon Gatesin kanssa toimittaakseen pahamaineisen huumekartellipomon syytteeseen, mutta tehtava mutkistuu, kun rikollinen uhkaa vahingoittaa Reaganeja.

programme.title: Arman Pohjantahden alla
programme.desc: Illan dokumentissa Arman tutustuu romanien vaiettuun kulttuuriin, missa kunnia ja hapeakasitteet maaraavat mista saa puhua ja miten tulee pukeutua. Millainen asema Suomen romaneilla on nykypaivana, millaisia ongelmia ja ennakkoluuloja he kohtaavat yhteisona seka yksiloina?

programme.title: Top Gear Suomi
programme.desc: Testissa himoitut ja paheksutut Lamborghini, McLaren ja Ferrari ja koeajossa Corvette C8. Teemun Perstuntumatestissa Sexmane, Joel Hokka, Tinze ja Juha Perala. Vieraana studiossa Henri Vahakainu ja ratakierros ennatysta tavoittelee Tuuli.

programme.title: Top Gear Suomi
programme.desc: Ismo, Teemu ja Christoffer selvittavat, kuinka paljon bensaa voi kuluttaa parissa tunnissa, kuinka nopeasti Helsingin lapi voi kulkea hillittomasti ja onko rallin tulevaisuus sahkobensiinissa?

programme.title: Lomakoti auringon alta
programme.desc: Juontajat lahtevat viela kerran tutustumaan lomakoteihin. Talla kertaa he pysyvat Lounais-Britanniassa Cotswoldsin alueella, josta he etsivat viihtyisia lomakoteja. Luvassa on muun muassa pyoratuolin kayttajalle suunniteltu paikka ja myos glamping-maja.

programme.title: Burgerimiehet Aasiassa
programme.desc: Burgerimiesten Aasian kiertue huipentuu Singaporeen, jossa ajetaan tandemilla paatyyn asti. Matkaoppaana toimii Singapore Sling ja listalta valitaan kaikki kertaa kaikki. Sarja paattyy.

programme.title: Farmi Suomi
programme.desc: Finaalissa nahdaan, kuka on tietavin, taitavin ja voimakkain farmari. Palopuheiden paatteeksi ystavyys ja avunanto punnitaan, kun pudonneet farmilaiset aanestavat yhden kilpailijan suoraan finaaliin. Semifinaalissa nahdaan todellista taituruutta ja neuvokkuutta vaativa tehtava. Jannittavan illan paatteeksi selviaa, kuka vie Farmin voiton ja 30 000 euron palkintopotin.

programme.title: Suuri seikkailu
programme.desc: Lapin luonto nayttaa seikkailijoille voimansa rankkasateen yltyessa. Joukkuekilpailun voiton merkitys korostuu ja kilpailuasetelma joukkueiden valilla kiristyy, kun seikkailijat kisaavat koskenlaskussa, yosta mokin lammossa. Ohjelmaa juontaa Jaana Pelkonen.

programme.title: Alaskan jaalentokentta
programme.desc: Kausi 3. Jakso 8/8. Heikolla jaalla. Lentajat tulevat apuun, kun yhden miehen eramaa-asutuksesta on loppumassa ruoka. Ongelmia tuottaa se, etta han asuu jarven rannalla, eika jarven jaa ehka kesta laskeutuvaa lentokonetta. Tulli paljastaa jalokivien salakuljetusoperaation, ja joukko hurjapaita laskeutuu helikopterilla vuoren huipulle, josta lahtee taydelliset laskettelurinteet. Amerikkalainen realitysarja.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Jamie saa tehtavakseen tutkia Eddien vanhan ystavan ravintolaa. Frank pohtii NYPD:n siveyskaytantoja. Danny ja Baez tutkivat turistin pahoinpitelya, ja Erin haastetaan oikeuteen.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Frank ja Dream Team ottavat yhteen, kun yksi ryhman jasenista joutuu tutkinnan kohteeksi. Lisaksi Jamie ja Danny tutkivat yhdessa autovarkauksien sarjaa.

programme.title: Arman Pohjantahden alla
programme.desc: Millaista on kasvaa lastenkodissa tai milta tuntuu menettaa oma lapsi, ja kuka siita paattaa? Illan dokumentissa Arman tutustuu lastensuojelutyohon ja pohtii missa kulkee viranomaisten vastuu ja missa vanhempien oikeudet kun kyseessa on lapsen hyvinvointi.

programme.title: Top Gear Suomi
programme.desc: Mika on paras autoilun vuosikymmen: 70, 80 vai 90 luku? Se selviaa testaamalla oman aikakautensa huippuautot Toyota Supra MK4, Ferrari Testarossa ja Dodge Charger. Teemu ja Christoffer jarjestavat Grillibileet yllatysvieraiden kera. Vieraana Jarppi Leppala.

programme.title: Det ar overnaturligt!
programme.desc: Gast Walid Shoebat. Gast hos Sid Roth ar en muslim, fodd i Betlehem i Judeen. Redan som liten lardes han hata judarna. Han berattar overraskande saker om Mahdi, den messias som muslimerna vantar p.

programme.title: Att hora Guds rost
programme.desc: Hur vet jag att det ar Gud som talar?. Nar man plotsligt fr en bra ide, eller kanske en konstig men betydelsefull drom. Ngon sager nt som ar mitt i prick. Hur vet jag att det ar Gud som talar? Med Patrik Sandberg och Sven Almkvist.

programme.title: Boneskola
programme.desc: Att resa upp en forsamling i bon. Jehova Shamma Herren den narvarande. Har delar Patrik om tv forsamlingsplanteringar som vuxit genom bon och hur man kan skapa en bedjande kultur i sin forsamling och kyrka. Ledarskapets viktiga roll att g forst in i bonen.

programme.title: Cafe Bibeln Uppsala
programme.desc: Medvetandet och Gud. Har manniskan en sjal? r hjarnan detsamma som vrt medvetande, vr sjal? Gr det overhuvudtaget att forklara medvetandet utifrn en naturalistisk varldsbild? Mats Selander och Leif Nummela samtalar.

programme.title: Pilgrim Media
programme.desc: Forlt for att f forltelse. Josef Lowdin undervisar. En predikan i frn Matteus evangeliet 18:21-35

programme.title: Ersattningsteologi eller inympad?
programme.desc: Den gode herden. Upphorde Guds forbund till det judiska folket d den kristna forsamlingen kom till? Eller har Gud tv folk? Dan Johansson och Jack Tommy Ardenfors diskuterar kring ordet "ersattningsteologi".

programme.title: Trons grunder med ke Carlson
programme.desc: En ny identitet. Det nya forbundet plystes redan i Gamla Testamentet och betyder att Gud forlter oss helt om vi tar emot Jesus. Vi fr en ny identitet baserad p vrt medborgarskap i himlen. ke Carlson undervisar.

programme.title: Letters
programme.desc: Johanna Hrd.

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: Tv grannar
programme.desc: Profetior. Pastor Robert ringer upp och delar en berattelse dar profetians gva hade en minst sagt viktig roll. Simon och rjans berattar om hur profetia fungerar i praktiken. Kan vem som helst f profetians gva?

programme.title: Jag motte Messias
programme.desc: Mitch Glaser. Mitch Glaser vittnar om sin judiska uppvaxt, hur han slde droger och om hur han fick mota Messias.

programme.title: Folk p Guds hjarta
programme.desc: Balkan: Bosniaker och montenegriner. Pelle Hornmark och Micael Lundin berattar om Balkan p Guds hjarta, och sarskilt om bosniakerna och montenegrinerna bland vilka de evangeliska forsamlingarna ar mycket sm.

programme.title: Ett liv
programme.desc: Jag var offer for vld i hemmet. Den vackra restaurangagaren Si flyttar ihop med sin nya pojkvan och blir fnge i sitt eget hem. Hon flyr och finner sitt varde och sin identitet.

programme.title: Lovsngens sprk
programme.desc: Anrison Vestine Denzako. Helande lovsng. Anrison Vestine Denzako frn Burundi ansg Gud nog hade gjort ett misstag d Han skapade henne. Men under en lovsngsstund befriades hon frn sina morka tankar och lever nu for att hjalpa andra.

programme.title: Israel talar
programme.desc: Jesus befriar frn droger. I staden Haifa p berget Karmel finns en speciell plats dar liv forvandlas. Israel Hai, eller Israel lever, ar ett rehabiliteringscenter for ryskatalande narkomaner och alkoholister.

programme.desc: En ny identitet. Det nya forbundet plystes redan i Gamla Testamentet och betyder att Gud forlter oss helt om vi tar emot Jesus. Vi fr en ny identitet baserad p vrt medborgarskap i himlen. ke Carlson undervisar.

programme.title: Letters
programme.desc: Johanna Hrd.

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: Tv grannar
programme.desc: Profetior. Pastor Robert ringer upp och delar en berattelse dar profetians gva hade en minst sagt viktig roll. Simon och rjans berattar om hur profetia fungerar i praktiken. Kan vem som helst f profetians gva?

programme.title: Jag motte Messias
programme.desc: Mitch Glaser. Mitch Glaser vittnar om sin judiska uppvaxt, hur han slde droger och om hur han fick mota Messias.

programme.title: Folk p Guds hjarta
programme.desc: Balkan: Bosniaker och montenegriner. Pelle Hornmark och Micael Lundin berattar om Balkan p Guds hjarta, och sarskilt om bosniakerna och montenegrinerna bland vilka de evangeliska forsamlingarna ar mycket sm.

programme.title: Ett liv
programme.desc: Jag var offer for vld i hemmet. Den vackra restaurangagaren Si flyttar ihop med sin nya pojkvan och blir fnge i sitt eget hem. Hon flyr och finner sitt varde och sin identitet.

programme.title: Lovsngens sprk
programme.desc: Anrison Vestine Denzako. Helande lovsng. Anrison Vestine Denzako frn Burundi ansg Gud nog hade gjort ett misstag d Han skapade henne. Men under en lovsngsstund befriades hon frn sina morka tankar och lever nu for att hjalpa andra.

programme.title: Israel talar
programme.desc: Jesus befriar frn droger. I staden Haifa p berget Karmel finns en speciell plats dar liv forvandlas. Israel Hai, eller Israel lever, ar ett rehabiliteringscenter for ryskatalande narkomaner och alkoholister.

programme.title: Det ar overnaturligt!
programme.desc: Gast Walid Shoebat. Gast hos Sid Roth ar en muslim, fodd i Betlehem i Judeen. Redan som liten lardes han hata judarna. Han berattar overraskande saker om Mahdi, den messias som muslimerna vantar p.

programme.title: Att hora Guds rost
programme.desc: Hur vet jag att det ar Gud som talar?. Nar man plotsligt fr en bra ide, eller kanske en konstig men betydelsefull drom. Ngon sager nt som ar mitt i prick. Hur vet jag att det ar Gud som talar? Med Patrik Sandberg och Sven Almkvist.

programme.title: Boneskola
programme.desc: Att resa upp en forsamling i bon. Jehova Shamma Herren den narvarande. Har delar Patrik om tv forsamlingsplanteringar som vuxit genom bon och hur man kan skapa en bedjande kultur i sin forsamling och kyrka. Ledarskapets viktiga roll att g forst in i bonen.

programme.title: Cafe Bibeln Uppsala
programme.desc: Medvetandet och Gud. Har manniskan en sjal? r hjarnan detsamma som vrt medvetande, vr sjal? Gr det overhuvudtaget att forklara medvetandet utifrn en naturalistisk varldsbild? Mats Selander och Leif Nummela samtalar.

programme.title: Pilgrim Media
programme.desc: Forlt for att f forltelse. Josef Lowdin undervisar. En predikan i frn Matteus evangeliet 18:21-35

programme.title: Ersattningsteologi eller inympad?
programme.desc: Den gode herden. Upphorde Guds forbund till det judiska folket d den kristna forsamlingen kom till? Eller har Gud tv folk? Dan Johansson och Jack Tommy Ardenfors diskuterar kring ordet "ersattningsteologi".
